lead_paragraph: O. J. Mayo has new representation — LeBron James’s agent, Leon Rose. Mike Woelfel, a lawyer for Mayo’s family, confirmed the signing, which was first reported by The Herald-Dispatch of Huntington, W.Va. Mayo and the agent Calvin Andrews of Bill Duffy Associates parted ways last month.
